name: Ember (itch) (Quaseymoto)
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2019.

Only One... Sense

A thematic exploration game where you help Ember, a small flame, help find his friends. 

However, at any time you can only use One Sense. While you're moving Ember will hide, making it too dark to see. While you're standing still Ember will come out, lighting your surroundings. But Ember is too loud to hear anything else.
